mapper.select: select accessories_id, stock_id, stock_code, accessories_name, unit, model, machine_type_id, importance, employee_id, type, importance_description from accessories where accessories_id = #{accessoriesId}

select accessories_id, stock_id, stock_code, accessories_name, unit, model, machine_type_id, importance, employee_id, type, importance_description from accessories
and accessories_id like concat('%',#{accessories.accessoriesId},'%')
and stock_id like concat('%',#{accessories.stockId},'%')
and stock_code like concat('%',#{accessories.stockCode},'%')
and accessories_name like concat('%',#{accessories.accessoriesName},'%')
and unit like concat('%',#{accessories.unit},'%')
and model like concat('%',#{accessories.model},'%')
and machine_type_id like concat('%',#{accessories.machineTypeId},'%')
and importance like concat('%',#{accessories.importance},'%')
and employee_id like concat('%',#{accessories.employeeId},'%')
and type like concat('%',#{accessories.type},'%')
and importance_description concat('%',#{accessories.importanceDescription},'%')
limit #{pageable.offset}, #{pageable.pageSize}
mapper.insert: insert into accessories(stock_id, stock_code, accessories_name, unit, model, machine_type_id, importance, employee_id, type, importance_description) values (#{stockId}, #{stockCode}, #{accessoriesName}, #{unit}, #{model}, #{machineTypeId}, #{importance}, #{employeeId}, #{type}, #{importanceDescription})

insert into accessories(stock_id, stock_code, accessories_name, unit, model, machine_type_id, importance, employee_id, type, importance_description) values
(#{entity.stockId}, #{entity.stockCode}, #{entity.accessoriesName}, #{entity.unit}, #{entity.model}, #{entity.machineTypeId}, #{entity.importance}, #{entity.employeeId}, #{entity.type}, #{entity.importanceDescription})

insert into accessories(stock_id, stock_code, accessories_name, unit, model, machine_type_id, importance, employee_id, type, importance_description) values
(#{entity.stockId}, #{entity.stockCode}, #{entity.accessoriesName}, #{entity.unit}, #{entity.model}, #{entity.machineTypeId}, #{entity.importance}, #{entity.employeeId}, #{entity.type}, #{entity.importanceDescription})
on duplicate key update stock_id = values(stock_id), stock_code = values(stock_code), accessories_name = values(accessories_name), unit = values(unit), model = values(model), machine_type_id = values(machine_type_id), importance = values(importance), employee_id = values(employee_id), type = values(type), importance_description = values(importance_description)
mapper.update:
update accessories
stock_id = #{stockId},
stock_code = #{stockCode},
accessories_name = #{accessoriesName},
unit = #{unit},
model = #{model},
machine_type_id = #{machineTypeId},
importance = #{importance},
employee_id = #{employeeId},
type = #{type},
importance_description = #{importanceDescription},
where accessories_id = #{accessoriesId}
